**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 279 2.0 **Usage** held in 1 hand **Bulk** 1 --- This staff resembles a blackened and burned length of ashen wood. You can Interact to touch the tip of this staff to a torch, tinder, or a flammable substance to ignite a flame. **Activate** Cast a Spell; **Effect** You expend a number of charges from the staff to cast a spell from its list. **Craft Requirements** Supply one casting of all listed ranks of all listed spells. Staff of Fire **Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 279 2.0, [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 595 4.0 **Price** 60 gp ---
  • **Cantrip** [_ignition_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1565)
  • **1st** [_breathe fire_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1457)
Staff of Fire (Greater) **Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 279 2.0, [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 595 4.0 **Price** 450 gp ---
  • **2nd** breathe fire, [_floating flame_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1533)
  • **3rd** floating flame, [_fireball_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1530)
Staff of Fire (Major) **Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 279 2.0, [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 595 4.0 **Price** 1,800 gp ---
  • **4th** [_fire shield_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1529), fireball, [_wall of fire_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1748)
  • **5th** fireball, wall of fire
name: Staff of Fire (Major)
